main event: A white light was observed overhead in flight, disappearing over the horizon in the northeast.
interesting points: The object moved straight up, then had a slight turn to the right before continuing straight and disappearing over the horizon.
The witness was a civilian medical technician at a hospital in Denver, Colorado.
Weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting.
Additional information was requested from the witness, but the completed forms were not returned.
witnesses: A civilian medical technician at a hospital
